mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.changdi_uuid_number as changdiUuidNumber ,a.changdi_name as changdiName ,a.changdi_photo as changdiPhoto ,a.changdi_types as changdiTypes ,a.changdi_old_money as changdiOldMoney ,a.changdi_new_money as changdiNewMoney ,a.shijianduan as shijianduan ,a.shijianduan_ren as shijianduanRen ,a.changdi_clicknum as changdiClicknum ,a.banquan_types as banquanTypes ,a.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,a.tuijian as tuijian ,a.changdi_delete as changdiDelete ,a.changdi_content as changdiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
